Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) offer many advantages over conventional methods of electrical generation including higher efficiencies and lower emissions.
Titulo: Environmental evaluation of thick film ceramic fabrication techniques for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The environmental benefits of the use phase of SOFCs have been extensively reported but it is important that the total environmental burden is evaluated.
Titulo: Environmental evaluation of thick film ceramic fabrication techniques for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is done by adopting a Life Cycle Analysis (LCA) approach.
Titulo: Environmental evaluation of thick film ceramic fabrication techniques for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An essential element of the LCA of SOFCs is the fabrication stage.
Titulo: Environmental evaluation of thick film ceramic fabrication techniques for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper describes the environmental impact of six SOFC fabrication methods;: screen-printing, slurry spraying, tape casting, calendering, electrochemical vapor deposition and physical vapor deposition.
Titulo: Environmental evaluation of thick film ceramic fabrication techniques for solid oxide fuel cells
